website_summaries.verdict: Packed with features, this compact microwave also offers a sleek, modern design at a great value.
pros: Capable of defrosting by time or weight
One of the few models to offer a sound-muting option
cons: Oven can slide when using the door because of its slick plastic feet

website_summaries.verdict: Users give this compact microwave high praise for its silent options and ease of operation.
pros: Offers 0.9 cubic feet of space and turntable diameter measuring 10.6"
Digital control panel controls 10 power settings, defrost mode, and kitchen timer
Pre-programmed settings for pizza, popcorn, potato, frozen vegetables, drinks, and dinner
Silent mode and child safety lock option
cons: Film protecting control buttons wears off relatively easily

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my reheating needs. Fits an average size dinner plate. Small enough to put in a closed cabinet. Although, nice looking if you wish to leave it counter top. There can be a bit of a slide on the right side as you open the door, because it's so lightweight. (Easy fix) Shipping was so fast, I received it in two days ! Very happy with my purchase and the price is reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Kinney

customer_reviews.title: The look and size is good. Have it now about four weeks
customer_reviews.text: The look and size is good. Have it now about four weeks. It is starting to take longer to get food hot. I have to put it on much longer than necessary. For instance to get a dinner plate of food appropriately hot it takes about 6 minutes. Normally, it should take about 3 minutes maximum. This is for a dinner plate of a piece of chicken and rice.
customer_reviews.author: Lana

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Light bulb went out 3 mths after purchase and I've been trying to use the manufacturer warranty to replace ever since with no luck. Toshiba doesn't recognize microwave warranties and NO ONE can find the serial number on the back. It works though you cant see your food but for the price ($90 when I could have went to target or Wal-Mart for $50-$60) I thought I was buying quality, not just a name.
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: Broke a few days after return period. Junky.
customer_reviews.text: Product broke a few days after the return period ended. No more spinning. Motor burned out. Toshiba send they are sending a check to reimburse me for this product. Check will take 4-6 weeks to get here. I suggest getting a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Morrow

customer_reviews.title: An awful microwave
customer_reviews.text: Everything takes about 50% extra cooking time compared with other microwaves in my life. For example, my previous microwave could heat a large mug of water to near boiling in about 2.5 minutes. This one takes 3.5 minutes. But it's also uneven. I cooked a breakfast sandwich today from frozen. Half of it is scalding hot. The other half is still frozen. It's just a terrible, poorly designed microwave, and any money you save by purchasing this unit will be paid for in daily payments of anger, frustration and tears.
customer_reviews.author: Yanni23

customer_reviews.title: Unbeatable price for the product
customer_reviews.text: I have tried to shop at other site but nowhere has a better price than Amazon for this product. Perfect size for countertop (home or commercial). Good material and nice design. I’m happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Bungheng

customer_reviews.title: It's a terrible microwave
customer_reviews.text: I used this microwave primarily for heating up beverages, soups, and small dinners no more than 7 minutes. It raddles... Makes scary noises and now there is a metallic burning smell! And that's with minimal use... I wish I had not waited so long that now I can't return it but just have to throw it out!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: machine works well; light starting to go after 6 1/2 months - video
customer_reviews.text: Machine is relatively quiet, does what it's supposed to do. Delivered 2/8/19. Today is 9/2/19; started flickering last week. Support ended 5/9/19. Usually don't get extended warranty - most electronics last longer than 6 months. Not crazy to expect that. Just got over-the-stove model (for other reasons) and will need to sell this - not likely to get a decent price b/c of the light. Wouldn't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Schwarz

customer_reviews.title: Broke After 4 Months
customer_reviews.text: It worked perfectly for four months. Then the light started blinking continuously when it was in use or when the door was open. After a few days of that, it started smoking. I called the customer service for Toshiba. They are going to send us a refund check in six weeks. They sent us a shipping slip to return the microwave. So it will be a bit of a pain to get a box to ship it back.
customer_reviews.author: Alan G. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good Brand
customer_reviews.text: Order came in on time but controlled panel was damaged. Then I ordered replacement one was good
customer_reviews.author: P

customer_reviews.title: worked well
customer_reviews.text: We wanted a smaller unit to save counter space. This little unit fits every thing we need to defrost and heat. It seems to heat better than the last unit and uses less power. The thing I like best is the fact that you don't have to wake the whole house up with that stupid beeper. If you need to hear it turn it on. The option of silencing it is a big plus in our house because there are 4 of us working different around the clock shifts.We have been using it for about a month and we like it.
customer_reviews.author: Captain Bad

customer_reviews.title: never turned on!
customer_reviews.text: This microwave came highly no wait most recommended by Amazon. When it got to the house and I plugged it in it did not work. When I called for support they told me to cut the cord. Take pics and I will receive a refund in a month. Not what I am used to with Amazon. Always been a great joy purchasing from them.
customer_reviews.author: Christy V.

customer_reviews.title: THIS REVOLVING GLASS TURNTABLE IS ALWAYS COMING OFF ITS TRACK THERE IS A DESIGN FLAW.
customer_reviews.text: I ACTUALLY HATE THIS MICROWAVE. THIS REVOLVING GLASS TURNTABLE IS ALWAYS COMING OFF ITS TRACK WHEN EITHER PUTTING SOMETHING ON IT OR TAKING SOMETHING OFF IT. 9 OUT OF 10 TIMES EVEN WHEN TRYING TO BE CAREFUL! THE TURNTABLE BEARING WHEELS DO NOT STAY IN ITS TRACK, THERE IS A DESIGN FLAW.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: Microwave take a very long time to heat anything. Went to reheat a slice of casserole and it took 8 minutes on the highest power setting. kind of defeats the purpose of a microwave. small but big enough for a large dinner plate. only the face is stainless not the whole thing so if your looking for something to match your other kitchen appliances this isn't it, Unless the rest of your kitchen is black. Also when this arrived the box advertised exactly what it was so if you live in a place where packages get stolen often probably have this delivered to an amazon storage locker. Will not buy again. Would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: G3MiNi92

customer_reviews.title: Broken in less than two months.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for just over 1 month. I have used it less than 10 times and yesterday it completely stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: Hilary

customer_reviews.title: Great Microwave - Light Bulb will Burn out Early
customer_reviews.text: Overall the microwave is great, but just be prepared for your light bulb LED to burn out with no easy way to replace. We've had the microwave a little over a year when the light stopped working. I opened up the back and the light is an actual LED that can NOT be easily replaced. Disappointed with Toshiba on the poor design or quality on this one - won't be purchasing another product from them.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Simple, intuitive interface!
customer_reviews.text: I spent a ridiculous amount of time researching microwaves recently--the space I have for one is small, and finding a good quality, smaller oven that can handle a dinner plate is surprisingly hard. In the end, I went with this recommendation from the great NYT consumer site The Wirecutter. It is super easy to use, heats food well and evenly, and doesn't hog the kitchen counter.
customer_reviews.author: gladpal8

customer_reviews.title: It's super quiet but not very powerful
customer_reviews.text: This micro is in replacement of a Magic Chef brand microwave that we used for at least 8 years before it ceased microwaving. We've had this Toshiba for a few months now: it's sleek looking, easy to use (after getting adjusted to the location of the settings) and works great. Despite the small size, which unfortunately we need because of the small counter where its placed, the microwave fits a very large bowl if you finesse it in. My only negative of this microwave is that it's less powerful than our Magic Chef (which I knew when purchasing it), and I am still in the process of figuring out the "perfect" time for warming up foods, etc.
customer_reviews.author: M. Watson

customer_reviews.title: Very uneven cooking - Big Disappointment!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this microwave mostly because it received great reviews. It looks great, fits my small microwave cubby and has plenty of power. I heat a lot of frozen food and what it does not do, even with the turntable, is heat the food evenly. I have had items that were too hot to eat on the edges but still cold in spots in the center. Positioning the items on the edge of the carousel helps, but it doesn't fix the problem. I'm going to give this one away and try another one so it was a complete waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: lynn bickel

customer_reviews.title: Quiet little microwave
customer_reviews.text: We don't microwave much other than leftovers, frozen foods and the occasional bag of popcorn. And for that, this microwave has been great so far. It is smaller inside than our last microwave, but it hasn't been an issue. It is very quiet, the touch-pad works well, and so far it's been a good little microwave.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Keefer

customer_reviews.title: Loving it!
customer_reviews.text: Needed an update on my ancient microwave from 1986! Wow, wasn't I missing out before! This microwave is so easy to use. The tray is a super feature that warms everything up evenly without leaving coldspots in my mac'ncheese. I was so happy to find that it fit perfectly in the same spot I was using before. The alert is not startling at all, a smooth sound let's you know your tea is ready without making you jump out of your seat. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Kay

customer_reviews.title: Small but nice, good unit especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: It's a small unit, which is what I wanted for heating my lunches at work. I see the 10% of negative reviews are mainly from people whose units broke. Presumably if my unit broke I would write a negative review too, but mine hasn't, and the features are amazing compared to the ~20-year old unit this replaces. Some people complain of the noise, but this unit seems quieter than some. And my stainless steel version is quite nice looking, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Juliehauser

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy - Stopped working in less than 3 months
customer_reviews.text: This Toshiba microwave was great until it stopped working completely in less than three months. Have been in touch with Toshiba customer service. Will update review once we see how Toshiba handles the problem. Had to send them a copy of the receipt. Amazon customer service assistant stayed on conference phone call while we dealt with Toshiba. Very disappointed in this product. Do not buy!
customer_reviews.author: A reader in Auburn, NY

customer_reviews.title: Caught on Fire after only 4 Months
customer_reviews.text: This thing burned out and the power supply erupted in flames last night filling the house with noxious fumes. And, NO, we were not microwaving metal. Had a couple of tablespoons of butter in a microwave safe bowl we'd used hundreds of times. It started making loud clunking sounds and we looked and there were flames coming from the side inside the microwave. Never had a microwave ever fail in this fashion.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry McKamy

customer_reviews.title: Not very good value
customer_reviews.text: It costs 50% more than the equivalent Daewoo I was replacing. I was expecting it to be better. It is worse. The user interface replaces simple operation with a greater focus on programmed functions without nonvolatile memory. For the $30 premium over Daewoo I would have expected Toshiba to splurge 20 cents on a microcontroller with a bit of flash to at least remember my settings, if not the time. In 3 months it malfunctioned. Midea-Toshiba support intelligently listened to my explanation of the problem and sent me a refund. I can't recommend this specific appliance but the company is honorable and I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: David Mccracken

customer_reviews.title: Inner bulb started flickering after 9 month of usage
customer_reviews.text: Bought the microwave 9 month ago and I'm already facing issues with it - the inner bulb starts to flicker every time I open the door. Flickering light is disturbing to say the least. Is it just a light or a sign of a loose wire? I used to have Toshiba laptop in 2000s and it was a sturdy piece of hardware, but looks like the quality is not there any more. What a shame.
customer_reviews.author: Daniil

customer_reviews.title: Good basic microwave, but actual capacity is approx. 0.7 cu ft.
customer_reviews.text: I selected this model based on the control panel description. I did not want a feature that required pressing a button for an extended time. It works as described, and the panel operates in a logical, simple way. It's a good basic microwave. The reason I didn't give it 4 stars is this false specification: ---Usable cooking volume is only 0.66 cu. ft. (11.75 x 12.0 x 8.0 in). There are "indents" in 3 sides, but it doesn't increase the USABLE volume, because, DUH, the wall near controls has no indent. If you currently have a 1.0 cu. ft. oven, you won't be getting the same with this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Quality Manager Guy

customer_reviews.title: Not the best quality
customer_reviews.text: Like the size and the look, but we felt as though the microwave was loud (has an underlying electrical hum that kicks in about a second after you turn it on). Can you live with it? Sure, I guess. We decided to keep it because of the convenient small size but when the buttons started peeling 2 weeks after light use we had to send it back. You would expect better overall quality for the price and for a Toshiba.
customer_reviews.author: mstraveler

customer_reviews.title: Died after three months.
customer_reviews.text: Customer support offers no repair or service options. No FAQ, no 'try this first,' no diagnostics, nothing. Clearly it's more economical for Midea, the company that manufactures this item (Toshiba is merely a badge — nothing about this unit is Toshiba but the brand name) to send out refunds than to maintain any kind of support or service. So a three-month old item becomes a piece of landfill — perhaps for want of a 25-cent fuse.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Not a long lasting microwave
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product in May 2019 and now its March 31, 2020 and the microwave is already broken. The LED lights went out today. The bottom of the microwave has a melted look, like it wasn't built to withstand its own heat. It still works, but who knows what will stop working next. Besides all this, the heat of this product is really weak. What took 1 minute in my previous microwave, takes 3 minutes in this one. I would not recommend unless you rarely are going to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Yudell Reiz

customer_reviews.title: Difficult setup
customer_reviews.text: Love the exterior looks. The led is great - Really bright! But it’s not super easy to navigate and I have never had more trouble setting a microwave oven clock , in my life! At my age, I’ve experienced quite a few microwaves and the clock on this one is a first! Entirely too difficult, goes against everything you thought you knew about setting a clock on a microwave and for the life of me, I don’t understand why Toshiba did it this way. I’m not recommending it solely on the clock. It sucks. It’s ridiculous and makes no sense.
customer_reviews.author: Matilda

customer_reviews.title: It didn't last long!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product so much! But lately there have been electrical sparks in it when I try to use it and I was worried even there would be a fire. I checked my Amazon account and realized I bought it in June 2018 and it's now May 2019 so it didn't even last a year.
customer_reviews.author: EKH

customer_reviews.title: Love Toshiba and Amazon!
customer_reviews.text: The microwave is great! I really want to praise the delivery of the microwave! It was quite complexed where I wanted it delivered and placed. The driver did an excellent job!!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly S.

customer_reviews.title: Fast and easy
customer_reviews.text: Great microwave oven for the price. Not disappointed at all. Love the easy use and less time it takes to warm food. Never had a light inside of any of my microwave ovens, so this is a big plus for me. Also I love that you have a choice to mute the beeps when the food is ready. I perfer not to, but its great that you have a choice and the noise when cooking is not loud at all. All round it is a GREAT! Would recomment to anyone who is looking for a microwave oven at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne Wetterling

customer_reviews.title: Great little microwave.
customer_reviews.text: A great little microwave that doesn't take up a whole lot of counter space. Size is quite adequate for a dinner plate. The glass is clear and easy to see through and the inside light is nice and bright. I wondered if the 900-watt rating would mean that it wouldn't heat as well as my old one but it does fine and it's much quieter. The sound on, sound off feature is handy if you share a kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Cowan

customer_reviews.title: 8 months old and isn't heating properly anymore
customer_reviews.text: I bought this 8 months ago and recently we have noticed that it is not thoroughly cooking our food. When I used it this weekend, it tripped the outlet. I've never had issues with a microwave in this house before and I think the microwave is faulty. Bummer. Who has room to save the packaging of every product for a year?
customer_reviews.author: AngelLeah

customer_reviews.title: Purchased as a back up while main microwave is being repaired.
customer_reviews.text: We have a built-in oven/microwave that came with the home. It is only three years old but the microwave section stopped working. It would cost $3500 to replace this unit so we are getting it repaired. But scheduling and part delivery is delayed so we bought this microwave as a temporary backup. It works GREAT! Actually better than our other microwave but it is a bit small. Fine for temporary use. And the price was less than we'll end up paying to repair the main microwave (probably about $500 parts and labor)
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Eastman

customer_reviews.title: A very decent product, at a very fair price.
customer_reviews.text: When I purchase this Toshiba microwave oven oh, I wasn't sure what to expect. So far so good. It's working just fine and seems to be very powerful. one of the reasons I purchased it was I needed something for a very small space and the advertising that the company put on Amazon's website was accurate. The only thing that I find a little bit disappointing is the weight of the microwave oven, I just wish it was a little bit heavier. Needless to say it seems to be working very fine and I highly recommend it. Purchase during the summer of 2019.
customer_reviews.author: OK Tamease

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: This is the cutest little microwave! It is very attractive and is so simple to use. I had a microwave from Sears that I bought over 20 years ago, and it worked perfectly! But it was white and I wanted stainless to go with my new kitchen. I also wanted a smaller one. I don't usually "cook" in a microwaves...except for popcorn and baked potatoes. It is just for warming mostly. I ABSOLUTELY LOVE that you can turn off the sound so easily!
customer_reviews.author: diamond girl

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic & Functional!
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with this purchase! It is a nice little microwave that fits nice & easy in the corner! I purchased this for the countertop, second & spare one for reheating tea, coffee & food etc conveniently without having to use the other large builtin microwave all the time! ! It is working very well indeed & highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Dazzling Diamonds

customer_reviews.title: Its a decent microwave
customer_reviews.text: Its shiny, its small, its quiet. When I say its small, its tiny. I warned my wife on the size but wow, even knowing it was small I was still surprised on the size. You can fit a dinner plate in there put don't push it. takes a little longer then I would like to warm up food but only by a few minutes. On the plus side of things, you almost cant even hear it when its warming food, and it was CHEAP! Cant complain about that can ya? Its a solid little microwave so far. Happy about.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Better than I thought
customer_reviews.text: Haven't purchased a microwave in years, so I did some research. This microwave is perfect for the size I need and has all the 'quick' functions I need, and then some. This microwave is lower in power than I'm used to, but I only have to add a few seconds each time. The size and low noise level...perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Working after 18 months
customer_reviews.text: Bought this microwave about 18 months ago. It worked fine for the first 18 months nothing fancy, but it served its purpose. Several days ago it just stopped working. The light inside won’t even turn on. Naturally, the one year warranty has expired. We will be staying away from Toshiba products from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Nicki

customer_reviews.title: This macroway doesn't last very long working. It's not worth the money to spend on this.
customer_reviews.text: At the beginning the microway was working fine but it has not been a year since we bought it and it no longer heats the food is not efficient I hope Amazon can replace me with another Although I read the reviews it speaks very well That's why I bought it but it really has not lasted what than expected. I’m waiting a respond
customer_reviews.author: julieta c azicri-diaz

customer_reviews.title: Didn't even last a year!  Terrible product
customer_reviews.text: I replaced a 2o-year-old microwave with this one which didn't even last 10 months! Sadly disappointed because I also bought one for my son.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: A good microwave @ a good price
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice looking microwave. It seems well made, although I think the warranty should be longer than 1 yr. It's very quiet & works well for my needs. I mostly use it for steaming vegetables & reheating meals, so the 1 touch buttons rarely get used. I gave it a 4 for small spaces because I think the 700 watt microwaves are the only ones that truly fit in small spaces, but they also have small interiors. This 900 watt is perfect for most needs.
customer_reviews.author: Betty A. Chilly

customer_reviews.title: Good microwave and heats up food and drinks evenly
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good microwave. Small and fits on our countertop well. Fits a 10” plate easily. Heats up food and drinks pretty evenly.
customer_reviews.author: Nimnyc76

customer_reviews.title: Learn what to tell others.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this unit and have only used it once. Reading the reviews I found something strange written by others that owned one. A couple said it started smoking within a couple months. ??? It has a warranty by its in the dump. That’s the dumbest comment ever. Send or take it back. Other comments said similar issues but each ended the same. Each could have received a refund or replacement. Please, if writing a review please write useful information instead of a stupid comment.
customer_reviews.author: Earnest B.

customer_reviews.title: My mom complained sparking...smelling stuff....
customer_reviews.text: The thing only lasted barely 7 months... bought Oct 2018.....my mom complained seeing sparks and lights blinking. I ask my 85 year old mom to stop using it and unplug. Unfortunately I did not buy extra insurance thinking this would be an appliance that will at least be good for 5 years. Its supposed to replace an old hotpoint that has been with the house since it was buillt in the 80's.
customer_reviews.author: FLIPSI

customer_reviews.title: Microwave
customer_reviews.text: I’m pissed left instructions to leave inside gate if stolen it’s on you I said push gate hard lift push hard lucky my neighbor brought to her home and gave it to me and it’s nice and works but drivers need to follow instructions takes forever to heat up food
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca L.

customer_reviews.title: An Excellent Value
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this microwave to have an extra one available for those occasions where food preparation demanded more than one microwave working at once. It also serves as a back-up--and offers flexibility in the event that a kitchen needs to be set up for someone quarantining in the house. Be that as it may, this microwave is well constructed and efficient--and, as of this writing, still seems like an excellent value.
customer_reviews.author: Edmund Campion

customer_reviews.title: Efficient, very nice appearance.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great in our stainless kitchen. Nice features. Interior a bit smaller than previous "small" microwave, so we had to adjust. Seems like we have to use more time to reheat than a previous microwave. Features and appearance outweigh the small adjustments.
customer_reviews.author: hulagirlfriend

customer_reviews.title: Underpowered (perhaps defective - it was that bad)
customer_reviews.text: My unit might have been defective but this was so underpowered something with instructions to microwave for 90 seconds would still be cold inside after 5-6 minutes. I replaced it with a LG unit that with a 1040 watt LG unit (LMC0975ST) that has smaller external dimensions yet larger internal dimensions. I haven't looked back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazon ships the wrong product two times in a row!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea; if this is a "decent" product!! I received (1) unit with defective parts! Notified 'Amazon' and was shipped another unit with the same exact problem!! ~~ I tried to alert 'Amazon' that they most probably had hundreds of microwaves in their warehouses with the same "glass turntable" problem! However they appear to keep shipping them out as units without the problem!! ~~ Beware of ordering a "Microwave' from Amazon!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Defective product right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Don't bother buying! I received the microwave, unpacked it, plugged it in and it just turned on by itself. The stop button didn't work. None of the buttons worked. I couldn't stop the microwave without unplugging it. And while the turn table was spinning and you could hear it running, it wasn't heating up. Probably a good thing since the thing was broken anyway or it could've been a real hazard. Negative stars if I could
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to set up and use, relatively compact
customer_reviews.text: I got this microwave after seeing it recommended by Wirecutter. They weren't wrong! It's very easy to set up and use--just add the rotating plate, plug it in to the wall, and hit Start/+30 seconds! It's also relatively compact, but definitely check the measurements to see how it'll fit for your space. :) The beeps on the microwave are pretty loud, but there is a way to silence them! I haven't done it yet, but it's nice to know that is an option. I definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: jendorbell

customer_reviews.title: The unit runs very hot on the outside.  Checking with manufacturer to see if I should worry.
customer_reviews.text: This is small and fits in a tight space and looks really nice. It does fit my 2-quart casserole dish even tho it's so small. Consumer Reports rates Toshiba one of the most reliable brands. However, I've never had a microwave that runs so hot on the outside. I can't keep things on top that aren't meant for heat. It needs a lot of ventilation space so I have to slide it out from the wall to operate it.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: The microwave caught fire!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT buy this product. My microwave caught fire. I reached out to the manufacturer and they do NOTHING! I know that the microwave did not cost a lot of money but I watch my money and don't have almost $100 to "burn" (literally)!
customer_reviews.author: shell

customer_reviews.title: Great for small space
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one of these we have purchased. The first one had a short life but did a good job for us and the small size is what we needed. Funny how forty years ago extra electrical outlets, cabinet space, Etc. was more than enough. Where did all that extra space go? Anyway, this is an adequate oven for two people, with lack of space. Not only would buy it agin, I did!
customer_reviews.author: glbegr

customer_reviews.title: Toshiba EM925ASA Microwave
customer_reviews.text: I am delighted with this microwave. It is exactly perfect for me. However for a family I would not recommend this model. It is rather light weight, especially the door closure and of course the interior is quite small. I am impressed with Toshiba quality and detail included in this very modestly priced model microwave. If I had a family I would buy a Toshiba but in a larger more sturdy model.
customer_reviews.author: Peaches and Me

customer_reviews.title: Love this microwave!
customer_reviews.text: I have owned many microwaves in the last almost 50 years and so far I'm thinking this may be my favorite. Like so many other Japanese products it just runs great. I used to say something like it's the Cadillac of microwaves. Well I have to be honest in my old age and my saying now would be ( it's the Lexus of microwaves!). If you have ever driven one you would know what I'm talking about.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Like it, but doesn't vent very well and now light flickers
customer_reviews.text: This replaced an antique 25 year old oven. But old oven vented well, this doesn't. But I like the toshiba, so quiet. Now I am adding to this review, the light flickers after about 3 minutes of use. I bought this 5 months ago. I am disappointed. Otherwise I would have liked this oven. Toshiba customer service to quick to respond, I am waiting for my refund check. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Lark

customer_reviews.title: Not my best choice
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had issues with this microwave cutting off after it’s run for a minute two. Then it want come back on for ten or fifteen minutes. Not that pleased with it. This is a continuous cycle, cutting off after a couple of minutes, coming back online in ten minutes. Amazon offered for us to return it but with travel and family during the Christmas Holidays we didn’t have it packaged and ready to return in the time allowed. Now we have to deal with figuring out how to get taken care under warranty
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Does not turn on.  Item defective.
customer_reviews.text: After reading a wirecutter review of best microwaves I bought this one for my parents. Came in one day, took it out of the box, plugged it in, and nothing happened. No lights, clock...nothing. Called Amazon to try to replace the microwave and was told the best they can do is contact Toshiba and ask for a replacement from them as it is still under manufacturer's warranty. Of course its past their business hours and no one is there and no I am staring and broken microwave and my parents can warm up there food. Really disappointed in Amazon and Toshiba.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: got a good 18 months
customer_reviews.text: Works totally great for a short period of time. After 18 months the turntable started making awful noises basically nonstop regardless of what was in the microwave. Eventually this stopped and then the light on it started flickerering extremely fast. At that point i just stopped using it because why risk it? Also 1 year warranty so this thing goes where it belongs in the garbage. Bonus info: their support submission form on their website is completely broken!
customer_reviews.author: cameron laborde-zank

customer_reviews.title: Best microwave for the dime
customer_reviews.text: Bought this following a kitchen remodel to replace an existing over the counter giant. This one looks good in my new kitchen, is fast and noise level can be controlled. Highly recommended after 2 months of daily use.
customer_reviews.author: strobe

customer_reviews.title: Small and Efficient
customer_reviews.text: When our microwave failed, we wanted something that took up less counter space but had a normal sized interior. Without going to an apartment sized oven, we tried this. It's a great size and it cooks more quickly than we expected. We feared it might be underpowered. It isn't.
customer_reviews.author: Brien

customer_reviews.title: Small and solid
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it was the Wirecuter's top pick. Works great and has been very solid. At first i thought it might not be big enough because it was smaller than microwaves I've had in the past, but I haven't found the capacity to be an issue in any way, and I appreciate the extra counter space.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Garry

customer_reviews.title: a small but powerful enough microwave
customer_reviews.text: i was afraid if this microwave will be not powerful enough when i got this, but it turn out it is a great compact unit from toshiba, with one press to heat up, save some button press! :)
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Lin

customer_reviews.title: Toshiba Microwave
customer_reviews.text: It's got a little less power than my previous one(about 100 watts)..so we adjust. Also not as intuitive as my prior Sharp''but it looks very nice and we need some more time with it...
customer_reviews.author: tennisplr

customer_reviews.title: A Gem of a microwave
customer_reviews.text: I had a small Westinghouse microwave I purchased from Target years ago that went rogue and melted things that should not melt. I am in love with this beautiful little Toshiba microwave!! It holds a dinner plate nicely and does a perfect job. Teenage grand kids visiting Grams have put it to good use. It size fits well in the corner of my counter too. I have no negative comments only good for this dandy, affordable microwave.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Corbin

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Our hand-me-down microwave heated it's last tv dinner, and we needed a replacement, preferably something a bit newer with higher wattage. This fit the bill! It works well, is simple to use, and fits in our limited counter space while still allowing us to fit our biggest plates in there. It's definitely an improvement compared to the old one.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: It's Still Working!
customer_reviews.text: I had read a lot of negative product reviews so I bought this microwave with a lot of trepidation. I chose a machine that had the highest total of 4 and 5 star reviews that fit the space I have available. I waited three weeks to throw out the very large boxes it came in. This microwave fits the space I have, is more powerful than the 20 year old microwave that gave up the ghost, is easy to use, easy to clean. And if it continues to work, I'll be very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works and Looks Great
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with this microwave. I bought it for my office- it replaced an older, bigger microwave where certain buttons and settings had slowly stopped working. It's much more efficient, has a handle instead of a push button(that had also stopped working on the old one), and a volume control which is important to have off in the setting we are in.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence J. Gardner

customer_reviews.title: To noisy
customer_reviews.text: There is little I like about this product. It is good for small spaces. It is NOT good as far as the following; the noise level when running is way to high. I find I really use it because of the problem. It is NOT easy to use the touch screen. Many of the functions are not readily understandable. The inside of the unit is almost to small for even a normal dinner plate. All in all I am returning this product as below my standards.
customer_reviews.author: George G.

customer_reviews.title: Silent
customer_reviews.text: I ABSOLUTELY CAN'T STAND BEING YELLED AT 5 TIMES BY MY MICROWAVE OVEN BY A LOUD OBNOXIOUS BEEP!!! So I bought this little oven and I can turn the gd buzzer OFF!! It is nice, powerfull, even quieter than most when running. Thank you Toshiba for giving me option of turning off that useless, stupid, annoying, ridiculous, loud, BEEP BEEP BEEP BEEP BEEP waking up everyone in the house!
customer_reviews.author: Sapian

customer_reviews.title: Works well, looks nice.
customer_reviews.text: Love the compact size and silent button feature. Heata up food well, just takes a little bit longer due to less wattage. Its about as compact and clean looking as a microwave can be aesthetically speaking.
customer_reviews.author: Blackb1rd

customer_reviews.title: Great, Small Microwave Oven
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice small microwave oven that actually serves the purpose of warming a cup of coffee or reheating a dinner plate. I do not cook in the microwave oven. I'm using it simply to reheat items and this works and saves counter space.
customer_reviews.author: tomatolady

customer_reviews.title: No annoying bells is a major plus.
customer_reviews.text: I love how you can turn off the annoying bells on this microwave. I was looking for a microwave that had no bells. I'm pretty smart. I know when the microwave stops cooking, because, well its stops cooking! Derh. Why do they add that annoying feature anyway? Here's a tip to the manufacturer's- dont put bells on microwaves and save that money for something else like pay your workers more. The silence is wonderful. And the reason I gave this 5 stars.

customer_reviews.title: In less than 9 months not operating properly!
customer_reviews.text: This is an update: purchased this microwave Oct, 2018. It’s now July, 2019 and for the last month the interior light is either blinking on and off repeatedly or is off completely when the door is open and when the microwave is operating. Very disappointing since I can’t return it. I thought Toshiba was a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: AMaes

customer_reviews.title: Flickering light problem :(
customer_reviews.text: I bought this brand and model based on a stellar review by Wirecutter. But just after 8 months of use, the interior light flickers badly and sometimes shuts off completely while the unit is cooking. Frustrating. Other buyers have noted the same problem. I'm going to contact the company to see if they'll fix or replace it since it's still under the one-year warranty. Panel is simple enough to use, but the microwave is pretty noisy. I wouldn't buy this product again mainly because the interior light is unreliable.
customer_reviews.author: SF fan

customer_reviews.title: Good little mircrowave
customer_reviews.text: I was desperate for a microwave so I really didn’t look at size but price. This one came and it is a bit smaller in size to my old one but it fit a large dinner plate. It won’t fit a large bowel if you are trying to steam a lot of broccoli or something large. But easy set up and heats up quick. Nice looking microwave. Happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good unit, inside dimensions a bit differen than stated
customer_reviews.text: All features have worked right out of the box. Instructions and keypad are easy to understand. Unit is very compact and works well for our counter. The only reason I rated it a 4 instead of a 5 is because the inside dimensions are slightly different than the opening. The stated dimensions are actually taken from a concave shape in the side and the back of the box. The width dimension at the opening is slightly smaller than stated, approximately a half inch. This is only a problem if that stated dimension is critical for your usage. In my case, I will be cooking bacon on the stove.
customer_reviews.author: John Austin

customer_reviews.title: Lightbulb went out
customer_reviews.text: Bought this microwave back in November. I like to keep the microwave door slightly open after use to air the inside out. And then my light bulb in the microwave starting to dim and flicked and eventually not turn on anymore. Anybody know how to fix this???
customer_reviews.author: karmen

customer_reviews.title: For starters sounds like a spaceship taking off
customer_reviews.text: For starters sounds like a spaceship taking off. I had it for two months and it started making weird noises and smoking. So it is now in the dump.
customer_reviews.author: Larry white

customer_reviews.title: Started to spark and burn inside
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this back in April and was fine until today. There was an inside wall plate or covering that started to spark and burn. Amazon says the return on this item is past (May 31). Not wanting to use this until something is resolved regarding the malfunction. Any help would be appreciated - this unit is only about 5 months old.
customer_reviews.author: DesignGuy

customer_reviews.title: Less then one year old , light died. Then started sparking. Dangerous
customer_reviews.text: Light died 6 months in, then it started sparking badly with ever other thing I cooked. Threw it out. No more Toshiba for me.
customer_reviews.author: soap123

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working within a few months
customer_reviews.text: Within a month this microwave started to go bad. Within three months it had stopped working altogether.
customer_reviews.author: mgplus2

customer_reviews.title: Faulty LED light!
customer_reviews.text: The light flickered for several months then went dead. Took off cover to find a led light that I can’t replace myself. Service call will cost more than unit. I would not recommend this product. Shame on Toshiba for this design defect. Customer support said it’s out of warranty and to have it professionally serviced. No other solution. Sad.
customer_reviews.author: W. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good microwave, love how much quieter it is than our old microwave. Also has a silence button so it doesn’t beep if you don’t want it to. The popcorn button is strange to work so I need to reed the manual, seems like not enough time on it. Otherwise it’s great, would but again. Numbers are more easily readable too.
customer_reviews.author: blueoleander

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Love this microwave is so quiet that sonetime I thought I forgot if I press the button or not to heat up my plate of food until I look and see the light is on lol. I own many different brand microwave in the past. This is one of the best one I use so far. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Susanna Tam

customer_reviews.title: flickering light
customer_reviews.text: I had no problem with this microwave until a year after purchase. The interior light starting flickering after 1 minute of use. I called customer service and they told me it's out of warranty so couldn't help. I just wanted to know if this was simply a bulb issue, or if it was dangerous. They couldn't help me. Now I don't know if I need to replace this after 13 months or how to get repair. I'm 70 and can't just carry it out for service.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Kulesa

customer_reviews.title: Good microwave!
customer_reviews.text: First, it was quicker delivered then planned and arived in good shape, not damage to any of it: machine nor package. Noise level is awesome, low. It can worm my meals good on just one minute. Third day so far, and its working still. I guess, I'll need to update in the future if some malfunctions occur. I'm very happy for now with this microwave.
customer_reviews.author: Nadya P.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use,uncomplicated timer.
customer_reviews.text: This Toshiba microwave replaced my old micro very well. The size is perfect for the amount of counter space we have to deal with It looks sharp and is easy to use. The inside area is quite big for a small unit.All in all we are very satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: Gene

customer_reviews.title: this micro got so hot I thought it was going to catch fire
customer_reviews.text: I liked the size and the way it was programmed for favorite foods but I it set for frozen vegetables for 5 minutes and the outside of the oven got so hot i unplugged it, now I don't have a micro wave,I'm afraid to try to use it
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: UP DATE Do NOT BUY Started Smoking.
customer_reviews.text: UP DATE. do not buy. This unit started smoking from behind the interior walls, a lot of smoke and smelled like plastic and wires. So much smoke we had to air the house out. We were only reheating a small piece of chicken for 1 minute. We never used this unit to cook....only reheat. It has a defect.
customer_reviews.author: Maverick K.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Pantry Microwave
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size to tuck into the pantry! I’m not big on having a countertop filled with appliances, so this little oven fit the bill. Heating leftovers occasionally, melting butter, and chocolate , that’s about all I need in a microwave. I like this little guy!
customer_reviews.author: L.A.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Small Microwave!
customer_reviews.text: It's big enough for a normal dinner plate. Works great and looks really nice on my small kitchen counter. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice basis microwave
customer_reviews.text: I bought this microwave because it was recommended on Wirecutter! We have used it a few times so far and like it. It is a pretty basic one not too noisy and does the job. I would have preferred it to be smaller since our kitchen is pretty cramped but I am still happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: gingc

customer_reviews.title: Takes a long time to heat food and coffee
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this microwave, except that for 900 watts it sure isn’t very powerful. I had a half pint back in the day, that would heat food and beverages better than this, and I think that was only 400 watts. Not overly pleased about the time it takes to heat stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Patti L

product_meta.title: Toshiba EM925A5A-SS Microwave Oven with Sound On/Off ECO Mode and LED Lighting, 0.9 Cu. ft/900W, Stainless Steel
product_meta.description: Color:Stainless SteelThis Toshiba 0. 9 Cu. '. 900 watts microwave oven with its (black) Stainless Steel finish and timeless look can match different kitchen styles. It features easy defrosting by weight/time, 6 auto menus, microwave cooking with 10 power levels, express cook buttons for 1-6 mines and memory function. It is equipped with bright A LED cavity light, a glass turntable, energy saving ECO mode, mute button, clock and kitchen timer. The bright LED digital display, easy-to-read control panel and easy-to grip door handle further improve the user experience. The compact size is ideal for apartment kitchens, vacation homes, offices and dorms. For further information please kindly refer to the user manual provided as a PDF document below the product description section.
feature_bullets: Stylish stainless steel with timeless design, external Dimension (w x d x h): 19. 2 x 15. 9 x 11. 5 inches, internal Dimension (w x d x h): 12. 36 x 13. 66 x 8. 7 inches
Pre-programmed menu for 6 popular foods like popcorn, pizza, potato and more. Rated Voltage is 120V~ 60Hz
One touch start - quick access to start the microwave from 1 to 6 minutes cooking at full power
Equipped with power-saving eco mode, sound on/off option and child safety lock
900 watts with 10 power settings, clock, and kitchen timer
Bright digital display, easy-to-read control panel, LED cavity light and 10. 6 inches glass turntable
If you wish to mute the buzzer of the microwave, pleas long press on the button "8" for 3-5 seconds. The buzzer is automatically switched off after a long beep.
The keypad was covered by a protection film during the shipment. Please peel it off before your first use.
1 year, please keep the packaging for contacting Toshiba after sales service and product returns.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars3,606 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
